      • gethazards

        public java.util.Set<Hazard> gethazards​(boolean special)
        Description copied from class: Terrain
        Hazards are things like a sandstorm in a Desert or a storm in Water, which can have dire implication for a Squad travelling in that terrain, Somewhat of a misnomer, a hazard can also be a more peaceful event like meeting a special character or such. Almost all types of hazards are dependent upon Season, Weather and day period conditions. No one suffers a heatstroke on the desert during the night, for example. Usually, even if the conditions for multiple types of hazards are met in a certain time period, only one of them should actually trigger.
        Overrides:
        gethazards in class Terrain
        Parameters:
        special - true if may allow a special event to happen. Special events are rare occurances like a spontaneous avalanche.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Terrain.HAZARDCHANCE, Javelin.getDayPeriod(), WorldMove
